page.title: 10THORNBURY SPORTS CENTRE
page.content:
The land for the Sports Centre was sold by John Henry Marshall in 1967 for Â£32,500. Outline plans for the building were approved in Nov 1973 and work commenced on phase 1 in March 1979. Phase 2 began 1 year later and the complex was completed in 1981. { {FACILITIES TIME PRICE} Squash 40 mins Â£2.15 Badminton 55 mins Â£2.30 Table Tennis 55 mins Â£0.95 Snooker 1 hr Â£1.80 Climbing wall 1 hr Â£1.70 Sauna 1 hr Â£1.70 Sunbed 30 mins Â£2.00 Solarium 10 mins Â£0.60 Bowls 2 hrs Â£1.10 Swimming adults Â£0.75 children Â£0.50
It is also possible to hire the halls, swimming pool and equipment.
